name: Shakira
description: Colombian singer, songwriter, and philanthropist, global pop icon known for her distinctive voice and dance moves
philosophy: Education is the only way to break the cycle of poverty. Music is the universal language that unites all cultures.
quotes: I prefer an ugly truth to a pretty lie
The worst mistake of a woman is to go to the kitchen, because then she never leaves there
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world
